column26: NextSeq 500 sequencing; Transcriptional response to wounding of Arabidopsis thaliana roots
column27: Transcriptional response to wounding of Arabidopsis thaliana roots
column28: NextSeq 500 sequencing; Transcriptional response to wounding of Arabidopsis thaliana roots
column29: Protocols: Samples were taken from roots of 7 days old plants in triplicates. Roots were cut into 3-mm explants at 0, 1, 3, 6 and 12 h after wounding. Arabidopsis thaliana (ecotype Col-0) plants were grown on Murashige-Skoog (MS) media containing 1% sucrose and 0.6% (w/v) gelzan under continuous light conditions at 22°C. Total RNA was extracted using the RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen). Library preparation was performed with the Kapa stranded mRNA sequencing kit (KK8420, Kapa Biosystems) and Illumina-compatible FastGene adapters (NGSAD24, Nippon Genetics)
